reviewText: Fans of modern art's progression  or of Eric Fischl as a figurative painter will find this material interesting and useful.  As advertised, it discloses some of Fischl's painting processes as well as his artistic views, interwoven with recollections of his personal achevements and experiences.  At only 38 min. in length,  the DVD manages to deliver, but one is left to wonder whether more could have been included without diluting the overall effect.  Nonetheless, an outstanding overall job as is.
